data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Quicke, Donald L. J., Broad, Gavin R., Butcher, Buntika Areekul (2012): First host record for the Palaeotropical braconine wasp genus Cassidibracon Quicke (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) with the description of a new species from India. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 28: 135-141, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.28.3192, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.28.3192
